KA3D API Reference Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:

Camera::StatisticsScene rendering statistics

Context::RenderSceneHelper class for exception-safe usage of beginScene and endScene functions
Context::StatisticsRendering context statistics

DoubleLinkedListItem< T >Double linked list item
float33-vector of scalar type float
float3x33x3 column-major matrix of scalar type float
float3x43x4 column-major matrix of scalar type float
float44-vector of scalar type float
float4x44x4 column-major matrix of scalar type float
GlobalsGlobals in hgr library
GlowPipePost-processing glow effect
Hashtable< K, T, F >Hashtable maps keys to values
HashtableIterator< K, T >Forward iterator of Hashtable elements
IntersectionUtilIntersectionUtil testing utility functions
LightSorterHelper class for sorting lights by distance
LinkedList< T >Double linked list
LinkedListItem< T >Double linked list item
LuaObjectBase class for C++ objects which are extended by Lua scripts
LuaStackRestoreHelper class for storing and restoring Lua stack stack top position
LuaStateState of Lua script running environment
LuaTableHandle to Lua table
MeshContainer for visual primitives
NodeBase class for all objects in scene graph
Node::UserDataUser data pointer base class
ODEObjectSimple wrapper for ODE collision geometry and simulated rigid body
PaletteBase class for platform dependent palettes
ParticleSystemParticle effect
ParticleSystem::DescriptionDescription of a particle system
PipeBase class for different scene rendering techniques
PipeSetupSetups scene ready for rendering
PrimitiveGeometry primitive list
ProfilePerformance profiling is important part of any game development
quaternionQuaternion of scalar type float

SceneRoot node of scene node hierarchy

Shader::BeginBegins rendering using the shader
Shader::PassBegins rendering specified pass using the shader
